name: Chips
description: Chips is used to enter multiple values on an input field.

separator.label: separator
separator.title: Separator char to add an item when pressed in addition to the enter key. Currently only possible value is ","

add-on-blur.label: addOnBlur
add-on-blur.title: Whether to add an item when the input loses focus.

allow-duplicate.label: allowDuplicate
allow-duplicate.title: Whether to allow duplicate values or not.

disabled.label: disabled
disabled.title: When present, it specifies that the element should be disabled.

invalid.label: invalid
invalid.title: When present, it specifies that the component should have invalid state style.

variant.label: variant
variant.title: Specifies the input variant of the component.

input-id.label: inputId
input-id.title: Identifier of the focus input to match a label defined for the chips.

input-class.label: inputClass
input-class.title: Style class of the input field.

input-style.label: inputStyle
input-style.title: Inline style of the input field.

input-props.label: inputProps
input-props.title: Used to pass all properties of the HTMLInputElement to the focusable input element inside the component.

pt.label: pt
pt.title: Used to pass attributes to DOM elements inside the component.

unstyled.label: unstyled
unstyled.title: When enabled, it removes component related styles in the core.

events.name: add
events.title: Callback to invoke when a chip is added.

events.name: remove
events.title: Callback to invoke when a chip is removed.
